pageTitle: The Prime Minister announces changes in the senior ranks of the Public Service | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced the following changes in the senior ranks of the Public Service:

Jean-François Tremblay, currently Deputy Minister of Infrastructure and Communities, becomes Deputy Minister of Indigenous Services, effective September 25, 2017.

Kelly Gillis, currently Associate Deputy Minister of Innovation, Science and Economic Development, becomes Deputy Minister of Infrastructure and Communities, effective September 25, 2017.

Biographical notes

  • Jean-François Tremblay
  • Kelly Gillis
